protocol.name: P-GSE40574-2
protocol.text: The control was grown in the dark; the hydrogen peroxide sample was grown in the dark and treated with 5mM H2O2; the light sample was grown in the light.

protocol.name: P-GSE40574-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis Col-0 seeds were grown on half MS media for 7 d, and then the seedlings were harvested.

protocol.name: P-GSE40574-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with the Qiagen RNeasy Plant Mini Kit under the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE40574-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE40574-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on the Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.

protocol.name: P-GSE40574-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.

protocol.name: P-GSE40574-8
protocol.text: The chip data were normalized by the RMA method and analyzed using the affy and limma packages in R/Bioconductor.
